body:
I got it on Saturday and let me tell you this....

ITS GOD DAMN AWESOME
If it's not the best 3ds game, I don't know what is.
Anyway I main Little Mac and Donkey Kong

title: Super Smash Bros 3DS

replies.body:
Oh my god yes.

I'm still experimenting with everyone, but so far, Zero Suit Samus, Little Mac, and Duck Hunt Dog are looking pretty awesome and I'll probably main two or all of those guys. But there's also Dr. Mario and Greninja which are good, but I'm also looking at Shulk... ugh, too many >_<
replies.body_tagged:
Oh my god yes.

I'm still experimenting with everyone, but so far, Zero Suit Samus, Little Mac, and Duck Hunt Dog are looking pretty awesome and I'll probably main two or all of those guys. But there's also Dr. Mario and Greninja which are good, but I'm also looking at Shulk... ugh, too many >_<

replies.body:
Here is my tier list(Based off the people I unlocked)
A+: Donkey Kong, Little Mac
A: Greninja, Roslina and Luma , Zero Suit Samus, Shulk
A-: Dark Pit, Lucario , Kirby, Meta Knight
B+: Pikachu, Pit. Samus, Ike, Falco, Luigi, Sheik
B: Lucina,, Olimar, Toon Link, Bowser
B-: Zelda, Captain Falcon, Link, Mario, Diddy Kong
C+: Marth, Robin, Fox, Palutena
C: Wii Fit Trainer, Villager
C-: Mega Man, Ness
D+: Sonic, Wario
D: Charizard, Peach
D-: Yoshi
F: Pac-Man

replies.body:
Dark Pit's neutral special, his Silver Bow, does more damage, but curves less.

Dark Pit's side special, his Electroshock Arm, has more knockback than Pit's Upperdash Arm.

Dark Pit's final Smash is a copy of Zelda's and Sheik's, using his Dark Pit Staff (which was actually my favorite weapon in KI: Uprising).

And, if you beat Pit in a 1v1 with Dark Pit, he'll say "Where's your goddess now, Pit?"
replies.body_tagged:

And, if you beat Pit in a 1v1 with Dark Pit, he'll say "Where's your goddess now, Pit?"

replies.body:
Thanks! However, I already knew the first two changes but I was wondering if there were any minor, technical changes (hitbox/hurtbox tweaks, other damage modifications, etc.)

But the 1v1 with Pit thing is really creative. Not surprised since Nintendo always gives attention to the small details in their games, particular Smash ;)
replies.body_tagged:
Thanks! However, I already knew the first two changes but I was wondering if there were any minor, technical changes (hitbox/hurtbox tweaks, other damage modifications, etc.)

But the 1v1 with Pit thing is really creative. Not surprised since Nintendo always gives attention to the small details in their games, particular Smash ;)

replies.body:
Yeah, they did some pretty cool things with the 1v1 victories. You can also see it with Fox beating Falco, Falco beating Fox, Palutena beating Pit, Lucina beating every other FIre Emblem character (I think), Male Robin beating Lucina, and Female Robin beating Lucina. There's problem a couple that I forgot, however.

As for really minor differences between them... I don't know any. Dark Pit is Pit's identical twin, so it'd make sense for them to basically be near exact clones.
replies.body_tagged:

You can also see it with Fox beating Falco, Falco beating Fox, Palutena beating Pit, Lucina beating every other FIre Emblem character (I think), Male Robin beating Lucina, and Female Robin beating Lucina. There's problem a couple that I forgot, however.

As for really minor differences between them... I don't know any. Dark Pit is Pit's identical twin, so it'd make sense for them to basically be near exact clones.

replies.body: Perfect! A thread about Super Smash Bros <3 I'm royally pissed they removed Lucas and added more clones. Nonetheless, I'm still excited to get it <3 So anyone have a suggestion for a replacement for Lucas?
replies.body_tagged: Perfect! A thread about Super Smash Bros <3 I'm royally pissed they removed Lucas and added more clones. Nonetheless, I'm still excited to get it <3 So anyone have a suggestion for a replacement for Lucas?

replies.body:
Ness.
Just kidding :P

Robin looks a tad bit similar to Lucas, with magic-based attacks. They have quite a few differences, but I think it's worth a try. He's pretty good at controlling space and his melee attacks aren't half bad.
replies.body_tagged:
Ness.
